bt: The clinical trial lasted a total of 12 weeks. The groups were compared on several variables, including second semester exam scores, heshi scores, and the quality and speed of clinical records. Over a period of two years, seventy-one undergraduate nursing students of second semester Nursing Surgery courses participated.

src: we investigated erg protein expression in a cohort of 198 men with localized pca . erg expression was correlated with patients ' clinical outcome and several pathological parameters , including gleason score ( gs ) , pathological stage , surgical margin , and extra - capsular extension . erg expression was detected in 86/198 ( 43.4% ) patients exclusively in neoplastic epithelium .
bt: We studied the expression of the erg protein in a cohort of 198 men with a localized pca. erg expression was correlated with the clinical outcome of patients and several pathological parameters including glazing score (gs), pathological stage, surgical margin and extra-capsular extension. erg expression was detected exclusively in the neoplastic epithelium.

src: type ii acots fall into the ' hot dog ' fold superfamily . there are currently six human type ii genes ; however , two homologous proteins , thioesterase superfamily members 4 ( them4 ) and 5 ( them5 ) share common type ii structural features and , in the case of them4 , acyl - coa thioesterase activity -- suggesting that the family may be larger than previously realised . although recent studies have greatly expanded the current understanding of these proteins and their physiological importance , there are a number of members whose functions are relatively unexplored and which warrant further investigation .
bt: Acots II belong to the hot dog superfamily. There are currently six human type ii genes; however, two homologous proteins, the members of the thioesterase superfamily 4 (them4) and 5 (them5) share common structural characteristics of type ii and, in the case of type ii4, the activity of the acyl-coa thioesterase - suggesting that the family may be larger than previously thought.

src: objectiveserine - threonine kinase stk11 catalyzes the amp - activated protein kinase complex . we tested the hypothesis that a gene variant in stk11 contributes to variation in insulin sensitivity and metformin efficacy.research design and methodswe studied the effects of a single nucleotide polymorphism ( snp ) ( rs8111699 ) in stk11 on endocrine - metabolic and body composition indexes before and after 1 year of metformin in 85 hyperinsulinemic girls with androgen excess , representing a continuum from prepuberal girls with a combined history of low birth weight and precocious pubarche over to postmenarchial girls with hyperinsulinemic ovarian hyperandrogenism . metformin was dosed at 425 mg / day in younger girls and 850 mg / day in older girls .
bt: The research and design objectives were to study the effects of a single nucleotide polymorphism (snp) (rs8111699) in section 11 on endocrine-metabolic and body composition indices before and after 1 year of metformin in 85 hyperinsulin androgen-excess girls , representing a continuum of prepubescent girls with a combined history of low birth weight to postmenarchial girls with hyperandrogen ovarian hyperinsulin .

src: development of novel biomaterials for drug delivery which forms a part of the so called novel drug delivery systems has always been exhilarating . mechanical evaluation of polymer based topical gels , which would be subjected to load or stress during its application , is inevitable.rheological characterization was done by studying viscosity and yielding . rheological modeling was also carried out.the viscosity and yield stress were inversely dependent on the eugenol concentration .
bt: The development of new biomaterials for the delivery of medicines that are part of innovative drug delivery systems has always been exciting. Mechanical evaluation of topical polymer-based gels, which would be subjected to load or stress during application, is inevitable. Reological characterization was made by studying viscosity and yield. Reological modelling was also carried out.

src: parasite lactate dehydrogenase ( pldh ) is extensively employed as malaria rapid diagnostic tests ( rdts ) . moreover , it is a well - known drug target candidate . however , the genetic diversity of this gene might influence performance of rdt kits and its drug target candidacy .
bt: Lactate dehydrogenase (pldh) is widely used as a rapid malaria diagnosis test (rdts) and is a well-known drug candidate, however, the genetic diversity of this gene could influence the performance of rdt kits and its medical targeting.

src: beryllium was released into the air from routine operations and three accidental fires at the rocky flats plant ( rfp ) in colorado from 1958 to 1989 . we evaluated environmental monitoring data and developed estimates of airborne concentrations and their uncertainties and calculated lifetime cancer risks and risks of chronic beryllium disease to hypothetical receptors . this article discusses exposure - response relationships for lung cancer and chronic beryllium disease .
bt: Beryllium was released into the air following routine operations and three accidental fires at the Colorado rock plant from 1958 to 1989. We evaluated environmental monitoring data and developed estimates of airborne concentrations and their uncertainties and calculated cancer risks and chronic disease risks. This article discusses exposure-response relationships for lung cancer and chronic beryllium disease.

bt: In addition, all peeling areas on the retinal surface documented by video were evaluated postoperatively using additional microperiometry.

src: 45 male c57bl/6j mice ( mean weight 27 g ) were anesthetized with ketamine / xylazine . animals were subjected to a weight drop closed traumatic brain injury ( wd - tbi ) , a femoral fracture and hemorrhagic shock ( fx - sh ) . animals were subdivided into wd - tbi , fx - sh and combined trauma ( co - tx ) groups .
bt: 45 male mice (average weight 27 g) were anesthetized with ketamine/xylazine. The animals were subjected to a traumatic closed-weight loss of brain injury (wd-tbi), femoral fracture and hemorrhagic shock (fx-sh). The animals were subdivided into groups of wd-tbi, fx-sh and combined trauma (co-x).

src: objectivea review of the literature on coccygectomy and our patients was performed to assess the effectiveness of coccygectomy for chronic refractory coccygodynia.methodsan english language pubmed search was conducted with the terms " coccygodynia " and " coccygectomy " from january 1980 to january 2012 . we retrospectively reviewed the medical records and performed telephone questionnaire on 61 patients who underwent coccygectomy at ucdmc between 1997 and 2009.resultsthere were 28 case series from 1980 to 2012 for a total of 742 patients who underwent coccygectomy following failed conservative management . the mean age ranged from 26.4 to 52.8 years .
bt: A review of the literature on coccygectomy and our patients was conducted to assess the effectiveness of coccygectomy for chronic refractory coccygodynia. Objective research was conducted in English using the terms "coccygodynia" and "coccygectomy" from January 1980 to January 2012. We retrospectively reviewed medical records and conducted a telephone questionnaire of 61 patients who had a coccygectomy at UCDMC between 1997 and 2009.

src: in the study area , pentachlorophenol and pentachlorophenol incineration sources have been identified , and the animal contamination and blood elevations probably reflect these sources . soil reference values and site - specific risk assessments should include estimates of exposures to contamination in home - produced animal products . such estimates can be verified with limited pcdd / pcdf sampling of animals and humans.imagesfigure 1figure 2
bt: In the study area, incineration sources of pentachlorophenol and pentachlorophenol have been identified, and animal contamination and high blood levels are likely to reflect these sources. Soil reference values and site-specific risk assessments should include estimates of exposure to contamination in animal products. These estimates can be verified with a limited collection of animal and human PCDD/PCDF samples.

src: resistance to fluoroquinolones ( flq ) and second - line injectable drugs ( slid ) is steadily increasing , especially in eastern european countries , posing a serious threat to effective tuberculosis ( tb ) infection control and adequate patient management . the availability of rapid molecular tests for the detection of extensively drug - resistant tb ( xdr - tb ) is critical in areas with high rates of multidrug - resistant tb ( mdr - tb ) and xdr - tb and limited conventional drug susceptibility testing ( dst ) capacity . we conducted a multicenter study to evaluate the performance of the new version ( v2.0 ) of the genotype mtbdrsl assay compared to phenotypic dst and sequencing on a panel of 228 mycobacterium tuberculosis isolates and 231 smear - positive clinical specimens .
bt: Resistance to second-line fluoroquinolones (flq) and injectable drugs (slid) is increasing steadily, particularly in Eastern European countries, posing a serious threat to effective control of TB infections (TB) and adequate patient management. The availability of rapid molecular tests for extensive drug-resistant TB (xdr-TB) is critical in areas where multidrug-resistant TB (mdr-TB) and xdr-TB rates are high and conventional drug sensitivity testing (dst) capability is limited.

src: we report the rare case of an 83-year - old caucasian male affected by a giant cholesteatoma that eroded the labyrinth and the posterior fossa dura and extended to the infralabyrinthine region , going beyond the theca and reaching the first cervical vertebra . the giant cholesteatoma was managed through a combined approach ( microscopic and , subsequently , complementary endoscopic approach ) . in this case report , we illustrate some advantages of this surgical choice .
bt: We reported the rare case of an 83-year-old Caucasian male affected by a giant cholesteatoma which eroded the labyrinth and posterior hard fossa and spread to the infra-labyrinth region , going beyond the theka and reaching the first cervical vertebra . The giant cholesteatoma was managed by a combined approach (microscopic and later endoscopic).

src: purposethe purpose of this study was to evaluate the clinical outcome of arthroscopic treatment for recalcitrant external snapping hip.materials and methodsbetween september 2011 and june 2013 , we evaluated 7 patients ( 10 cases ) with snapping hip who were refractory to conservative treatments for at least 3 months . two patients ( 4 cases ) were impossible to adduct both knees in 90of hip flexion . surgery was done in lateral decubitus position , under spinal anesthesia .
bt: The purpose of this study was to assess the clinical outcome of arthroscopic treatment for recalcitrant external hip cutting materials and methods. Between September 2011 and June 2013, we evaluated 7 patients (10 cases) with hip cutting who were refractory to conservative treatments for at least 3 months. Two patients were unable to soften both knees in 90 hip bends.

src: introductiondiagnosis of peritoneal tuberculosis ( ptb ) is difficult , even in developed countries , where data are lacking . the aim of the present study was to describe the clinical presentation , diagnosis , and bacterial epidemiology of ptb in france over a 10-year period.methodsa retrospective study was conducted on ptb in two university hospitals in france , between january 2004 and december 2014.resultsamong the 34 patients , 76.5% were migrants from areas of endemic tuberculosis ( tb ) , mainly africa . the main presentation ( 85.3% ) was a checkup of ascites or suspicion of peritoneal carcinomatosis .
bt: The aim of this study was to describe the clinical presentation and bacterial epidemiology of peritoneal tuberculosis (PTB) in France over a period of 10 years.The method of the retrospective study was carried out on PTB in two university hospitals in France between January 2004 and December 2014.The results, among 34 patients , 76.5% were migrants from endemic areas of peritoneal tuberculosis (PTB), mainly in Africa.The main presentation (85.3%) was a control of ascites or tuberculosis in the United States.

bt: Six months later, due to persistent symptoms, the patient underwent a high-resolution esophageal manometry (hrem) demonstrating the esophagus of the hammer-piece. The patient was treated with a high dose of proton pump inhibitor but without resolving her symptoms. During the last year, the patient reported repeated episodes of food regurgitation and significant weight loss.

bt: The inability to identify a retinal rupture during surgery was associated with a lower retinal reattachment rate , worse final visual acuity and a higher re-opening rate (p = 0.002 , p = 0.02 respectively).

src: we reviewed a cohort of patients with previously untreated locoregional advanced head and neck squamous cell carcinoma ( hnscc ) who received a uniform chemoradiotherapy regimen . retrospective review was performed of 105 patients with stage iii or iv hnscc treated at greater baltimore medical center from 2000 to 2007 . radiation included 125 cgy twice daily for a total 70 gy to the primary site .
bt: We looked at a cohort of patients with advanced locoregional head and neck squamous cancers (LHCs) who had not been treated before and who received a uniform chemoradiotherapy regimen. A retrospective review was conducted of 105 patients with Stage III or IV HHCs treated at Greater Baltimore Medical Center from 2000 to 2007. Radiation included 125 cgs twice daily for a total of 70 ggs at the primary site.

src: liver metastases from colorectal carcinoma commonly form nodular lesions in the liver parenchyma . we report a case of liver metastasis from rectal adenocarcinoma that extended predominantly into the bile duct . a 62-year - old japanese man underwent low anterior resection for rectal adenocarcinoma 9 years ago .
bt: Liver metastases of colorectal cancer usually form nodule lesions in the hepatic parenchyma.

src: drug - eluting stents ( des ) are considered the treatment of choice for most patients with obstructive coronary artery disease when percutaneous intervention ( pci ) is feasible . however , stent thrombosis seems to occur more frequently with des and occasionally is associated with resistance to anti - platelet drugs . we have experienced a case of recurrent stent thrombosis in a patient with clopidogrel resistance .
bt: Stent-releasing drugs (s) are considered the treatment of choice for most patients with obstructive coronary artery disease when percutaneous intervention (PCI) is feasible . However , stent thrombosis appears to occur more frequently with and is sometimes associated with resistance to anti-thrombostatic drugs .

bt: The mean change in haemoglobin levels for the 15 patients who followed at least 9 treatments was 1.7 g / dl (median , 1.1 g / dl; range , 1.9 g / dl to 3.2 g / dl); it reached 2.1 g / dl (median , 1.3 g / dl; range , 0.2 g / dl to 4.6 g / dl; p = 0.0007 ) for the 14 patients who followed the 12 weekly treatments . Five patients (from 20.0%) received transfusions and were considered to have failed to receive blood transfusions .

src: overall 86.9% of respondents felt that the proposed hierarchical nature of injuries was appropriate , and 77.8% of respondents agreed that that the risk of neurologic injury is highest in a vertical fracture through the foramen . almost 80% of respondents felt that the separation of injuries based on the integrity of l5s1 facet was appropriate , and 83.8% of surgeons agreed that a nondisplaced sacral u fracture is a clinically relevant entity . conclusion this study determines the global perspective on controversial areas in the injury patterns of sacral fractures and demonstrates that the development of a comprehensive and universally accepted sacral classification is possible .
bt: 86.9% of respondents believed the proposed hierarchical nature of injuries was appropriate, and 77.8% agreed that the risk of neurological injury is highest in a vertical foramen fracture. In general, nearly 80% of respondents believed that the separation of injuries based on the integrity of l5s1 was appropriate, and 83.8% of surgeons agreed that an unmoved sacral fracture is a clinically relevant entity.

src: the metsy was defined according to the revised national cholesterol education program third adult treatment panel . all probable predictive models and their predictive performance were provided using leave - one - out cross - validated logistic regression and the receiver operation characteristic curve methods . multiple linear regression was performed to assess factors associated with the cmetsys.the study population consisted of 8313 persons ( 49.9% male , mean age 38.54 15.86 years ) .
bt: The meteorological methodology was defined according to the National Revised Cholesterol Education Programme and the Third Adult Treatment Panel . All probable predictive models and their predictive performance were provided using logistical regression validated using - one - one - holidays and the characteristic curve methods of receptor operation . Multiple linear regression was performed to assess factors associated with cmetsys . The study population consisted of 8313 people (49.9% male , average age 38.54 years).

src: introductioncare coordination is an important aspect of nursing care especially for elderly patients admitted to an acute care setting . in singapore care coordination and transitional care nursing is a new concept of care nevertheless important but unexplored.aim/objectivesthe objective of this paper is to explore the characteristics of elderly patients receiving care coordination , determine care gaps and intervention during home visit and telephonic review.research design and samplinga designed questionnaire was used to collect information on the patient s demography , social and clinical profile and determine post discharge activities using eric coleman s four pillars tool . a pilot study of ten questionnaires was conducted .
bt: Healthcare coordination is an important aspect of nursing, especially for elderly patients admitted to an intensive care facility. In Singapore, care coordination and transitional care is a new concept of care that is important yet unexplored.The purpose of this paper is to explore the characteristics of elderly patients receiving care coordination, identify gaps in care and intervention during home visit and telephone examination.The research design and sampling questionnaire were used to collect information on patient demography, social and clinical profile and determine post-acquisition through the use of four pillars of Eric activity.

src: fundamental problems with personality disorders ( pd ) diagnostic system in the previous version of dsm , led to the revision of dsm . therefore , a multidimensional system has been proposed for diagnosis of personality disorder features in dsm-5 . in the dimensional approach of dsm-5 , personality disorders diagnosis is based on levels of personality functioning ( criteria a ) and personality trait domains ( criteria b).the purpose of this study was firstly , to examine the dsm-5 levels of personality functioning in antisocial and borderline personality disorders , and second , to explore which levels of personality functioning in patients with antisocial and borderline personality disorders can better predicted severity than others.this study had a cross sectional design .
bt: The fundamental problems of the personality disorder (dsm) diagnostic system in the previous version of dsm led to the revision of dsm. Therefore, a multidimensional system was proposed for the diagnosis of personality disorder characteristics in dsm-5. In the dimensional approach of dsm-5, the diagnosis of personality disorders is based on the levels of personality functioning (criterion a) and the areas of personality traits (criterion b).The purpose of this study was first to examine the levels of functioning of the dsm-5 personality in antisocial and borderline personality disorders, and secondly, to explore which levels of personality functioning in patients.

src: chromosome 22q13.3 deletion syndrome is a well - recognized cause of global developmental delay , while duplication of the same chromosome is a rare occurrence . the presence of both abnormalities in the same family has never been reported , to our knowledge . we report a rare occurrence of 22q13.3 duplication and 22q13.3 deletion in siblings , as a consequence of a mother 's inversion on her 22nd chromosome ( p13;q13.32 ) .
bt: The syndrome of chromosome 22q13.3 suppression is a well-known cause of global developmental delay, whereas the duplication of the same chromosome is a rarity. The presence of these two abnormalities in the same family has never been reported, to our knowledge.

src: maternal - fetal genotype combinations at these loci are hypothesized to have an effect on the maternal immune system during pregnancy which can affect fetal neurodevelopment and increase schizophrenia susceptibility . this article reviews maternal - fetal genotype incompatibility studies and schizophrenia and discusses the hypothesized biological role of these incompatibility genes . it concludes that research is needed to further elucidate the role of rhd and hla - b maternal - fetal genotype incompatibility in schizophrenia and to identify other genes that produce an adverse prenatal environment through a maternal - fetal genotype incompatibility mechanism .
bt: This study examines studies of maternal-fetal genotype incompatibility and schizophrenia and discusses the hypothetical biological role of these incompatibility genes, concluding that research is needed to further shed light on the role of maternal-fetal genotype incompatibility in schizophrenia and to identify other genes that produce an unfavorable prenatal environment.

src: the aim of this study was to evaluate clinical characteristics , prognostic factors , survival rates , and treatment modalities in patients with primary gastric lymphoma ( pgl ) . we retrospectively reviewed and analyzed data from patients treated for pgl in our clinic from 1998 through 2010 . staging was performed using the lugano staging system .
bt: The aim of this study was to assess clinical characteristics , prognostic factors , survival rates and treatment modalities in patients with primary gastric lymphoma (PGL). We retrospectively reviewed and analysed data from patients treated for PGL in our clinic from 1998 to 2010 .

bt: Symptomatic trigeminal neuralgia due to a brainstem infarction is said to be rare . However , facial pain is not uncommon in Wallenberg syndrome . Facial pain associated with Wallenberg syndrome can be either persistent or intermittent , and sometimes occurs in brief attacks .

src: the factors affecting the correlation between parkinson disease ( pd ) and depression have remained unclear.we assessed the prevalence of depression among patients with pd and the association between pd - related variables and depression severity.this is a cross - sectional study performed in kermanshah province of iran . sampling was based on recruitment of subjects according to inclusion and exclusion criteria . patients with confirmed parkinson disease who were referred to clinics of kermanshah university of medical sciences participated in this study .
bt: The factors influencing the correlation between Parkinson's disease (PD) and depression remain uncertain.We assessed the prevalence of depression in patients with PD and the association between PD-related variables and the severity of depression.This is a cross-sectional study conducted in the Iranian province of Kermanshah. The sampling was based on recruitment of subjects according to inclusion and exclusion criteria. Patients with confirmed Parkinson's disease who were referred to clinics at the Kermanshah University of Medical Sciences participated in this study.

bt: Elisa and flow cytometry were performed to verify the binding activity of the antigen to the immunotoxin epcam (scfv2a9-pe or ape).

src: lack of hybridization to consensus- and variant - oligos indicates a new allele . detection of unknown variants in heterozygous samples depends upon fluorimetric analysis of signal intensity based on the principle that homozygous samples generate twice the amount of signal . this method can identify unknown snp in heterozygous conditions with a sensitivity of 82% and specificity of 90% .
bt: The detection of unknown variants in heterogothic samples depends on fluorimetric analysis of signal intensity based on the principle that homogothic samples generate twice as much signal. This method can identify unknown snp under heterogothic conditions with a sensitivity of 82% and a specificity of 90% .

src: american trypanosomiasis or chagas disease is a debilitating disease representing an important social problem that affects , approximately , 10 million people in the world . the main aggravating factor of this situation is the lack of an effective drug to treat the different stages of this disease . in this context , the search for trypanocidal substances isolated from plants , synthetic or semi synthetic molecules , is an important strategy .
bt: Trypanosomiasis or Chagas disease is a debilitating American disease that is a major social problem affecting about 10 million people worldwide. The main aggravating factor of this condition is the lack of an effective drug to treat the various stages of this disease. In this context, the search for plant- isolated trypanocide substances, synthetic or semi-synthetic molecules, is an important strategy.

src: of the 168 participants , 31.0% were classified as normal weight ( bmi = 18.524.9 kg / m2 ) , 36.3% were classified as overweight ( bmi = 25.029.9 kg / m2 ) , and 32.7% were classified as obese , classes i and ii ( bmi = 3039.9 kg / m2 ) . there were no significant differences among bmi groups on t25fw and 6mw , cw , spatiotemporal gait parameters , msws-12 , or daily step and movement counts . the prevalence of overweight and obesity in this sample was almost 70% , but there was not a consistent nor significant impact of bmi on outcomes of mobility .
bt: Of the 168 participants, 31.0% were classified as having normal weight (bmi = 18.524.9 kg/m2), 36.3% were classified as having excess weight (bmi = 25.029.9 kg/m2), and 32.7% were classified as obese, class i and ii (bmi = 3039.9 kg/m2). There were no significant differences between the bmi groups on the parameters of t25fw and 6mw, cw, spatiotemporal walking parameters, msws-12 or daily step and movement counts.

src: triatoma brasiliensis sensu lato ( s.l . ) , the main vector of chagas disease in northeastern brazil , is a species complex comprising four species , one with two subspecies ( t. brasiliensis brasiliensis , t. brasiliensis macromelasoma , t. juazeirensis , t. sherlocki , and t. melanica ) , and each taxon displaying distinct ecological requirements . in order to evaluate the genetic relationships among nine t. brasiliensis s.l .
bt: Triatoma brasiliensis sensu lato (t.l.), the main vector of chagas disease in northeastern Brazil, is a species complex composed of four species, one with two subspecies (t. brasiliensis brasiliensis, t. brasiliensis macromelasoma, t. juazeirensis, t. sherlocki and t. melanica) and each taxon with distinct ecological requirements.

src: skin - lightening is an aesthetic practice of global concern . by adopting a biopsycho - social approach , we consider the interplay between the biological , psychological and social factors that underpin the circulation and consumption of skin lighteners in south africa . this paper reflects on biological aspects of skin lightening , interpersonal relationships , individual beliefs and expectations about the maintenance of health and well being that informs cosmetic practices .
bt: Using a biopsycho-social approach, we examine the interaction between the biological and social factors underlying the circulation and consumption of skin lights in South Africa. This paper reflects on the biological aspects of skin lighting, interpersonal relationships, individual beliefs and expectations about health and wellbeing that inform cosmetic practices.

src: similar codes were grouped into categories , and broader themes were developed from these categories . four themes were identified : social network and relationships ; interactions with agencies ; recognition of role ; and time for oneself . by identifying what affects carers ' quality of life , an appropriate choice can be made when selecting instruments for future carer research .
bt: Four themes were identified: social networks and relationships; interaction with agencies; role recognition; and time for oneself .

src: pancreatic cell failure leads to diabetes development . during disease progression , cells adapt their secretory capacity to compensate the elevated glycaemia and the peripheral insulin resistance . this compensatory mechanism involves a fine - tuned regulation to modulate the endoplasmic reticulum ( er ) capacity and quality control to prevent unfolded proinsulin accumulation , a major protein synthetized within the cell .
bt: During progression of the disease, cells adapt their secretory capacity to compensate for increased blood sugar and peripheral insulin resistance. This compensatory mechanism involves fine regulation to modulate the capacity and quality control of the endoplasmic reticulum (ER) to prevent the accumulation of proinsulin, a major protein synthesized in the cell.

src: mitochondrial genomes often contain large amounts of plastid dna ( ptdna)-derived sequences ( mtpts ) . it has been suggested that the intercompartmental transfer of ptdna is greatly reduced in species with only a single plastid per cell ( monoplastidic ) as compared with those with many plastids per cell ( polyplastidic ) . this hypothesis has not been applied to the movement of dna from plastids to mitochondria .
bt: Mitochondrial genomes often contain large amounts of plastid-derived DNA sequences (ptdna) (mtpts). It has been suggested that intercompartmental DNA transfer is significantly reduced in species with a single plastids per cell (monoplastic) compared to those with many plastids per cell (polyplastic). This hypothesis has not been applied to the movement of plastids to mitochondria.

src: many research studies report the healing effects of aloe vera , thyroid hormone cream and silver sulfadiazine . however , the effects of these therapeutic agents are not well understood and have not been compared in one study . this study aimed at investigating the effects of topical application of an aloe vera gel , a thyroid hormone cream and a silver sulfadiazine cream on the healing of skin wounds surgically induced in wistar rats for determining the treatment of choice .
bt: Many research studies report the healing effects of aloe vera, thyroid cream and silver sulfadiazine. However, the effects of these therapeutic agents are not well understood and have not been compared in a single study. This study was aimed at studying the effects of topical application of aloe vera gel, thyroid hormone cream and silver sulfadiazine on the healing of surgically induced skin wounds in wistar rats to determine the treatment of choice.

src: introductionthe spleen is a highly vascular organ and is in close proximity to many potential primary sites such as the stomach , breast , pancreas and colon . it is however an unusual site for metastatic disease . the reasons for this are not fully understood at the present time .
bt: The introduction of the spleen is a highly vascular organ and is located near many potential sites such as the stomach, breast, pancreas and colon, although it is an unusual site for metastatic disease.

src: it is known that the brain adaptively recalibrates itself to small ( 100 ms ) auditory visual ( av ) temporal asynchronies so as to maintain intersensory temporal coherence . here we explored whether spatial disparity between a sound and light affects av temporal recalibration . participants were exposed to a train of asynchronous av stimulus pairs ( sound - first or light - first ) with sounds and lights emanating from either the same or a different location .
bt: The brain is known to adjust to small temporary visual asynchronous (AV) visual (AV) to maintain intersensory time coherence. We explored whether the spatial disparity between sound and light affects time adjustment. Participants were exposed to a series of asynchronous av (son-first or light-first) pairs of stimuli with sounds and lights emanating from a different place.

bt: The 13 mm prosthetic crown did not result in statistically significant differences in the stress distribution between the implantation systems and the implantation lengths studied, regardless of the type of load (p > 0,05).

src: head and neck squamous cell carcinomas are among the most common neoplasms worldwide and characterized by local tumor aggressiveness , high rate of early recurrences , development of metastasis , and second primary cancers . despite modern therapeutic strategies and sophisticated surgical management , overall survival - rates remained largely unchanged over the last decades . thus , the need for novel treatment options for this tumor entity is undeniable .
bt: Head and neck squamous cell cancers are among the most common neoplasms worldwide and are characterized by local tumor aggression, high rates of early recurrence, the development of metastases and primary secondary cancers. Despite modern treatment strategies and sophisticated surgical management, overall survival rates have remained largely unchanged over the past few decades.

src: for this purpose , formalin - fixed and paraffin - embedded sections obtained from 15 normal ( at autopsy ) donors and 12 men with prostate cancer were analyzed by immunohistochemistry . about 40% of both normal and tumor prostate samples resulted spanx positive . signals were exclusively within the nucleus in normal prostate cells , whereas both nuclear and cytoplasmic positivity was observed in tumor cells .
bt: For this purpose , formal - fixed and paraffin - embedded sections obtained from 15 normal (autopsy) donors and 12 men with prostate cancer were analysed by immunohistochemistry . About 40% of normal and tumor prostate samples tested positive for the spandex . The signals were exclusively inside the nucleus in normal prostate cells , while nuclear positivity was observed in tumor cells .

src: in the latest year , and also in 2013 , salmonella was the most frequently detected causative agent in foodborne outbreaks ( fbos ) reported in europe . as indicated in efsa report ( 2015 ) the serotypes mostly associated to fbos are s. typhimurium and enteritidis ; while salmonella typhimurium is generally associated with the consumption of contaminated pork and beef , fbos due to salmonella enteritidis are linked to eggs and poultry meat . in this study it is described the investigation of a domestic fbo involving four adults and linked to homemade lasagne .
bt: In 2013, salmonella was the leading causative agent detected in the reported food outbreaks (fbos) in Europe. As reported in the efsa (2015) report, the serotypes mainly associated with fbos are s. typhimurium and enteritidis; while salmonella typhimurium is generally associated with consumption of contaminated pork and beef, fbos due to salmonella enteritidis are linked to eggs and poultry meat.

bt: We developed a specific monoclonal antibody against 6-oxo - m1dg and incorporated this antibody into a procedure to isolate the immunoaffinity of 6-oxo - m1dg from biological matrices. The purified analyte is quantified by lc - ms / ms using a stable isotope analogue - labeled ([15n5]-6-oxo - m1dg] as the internal standard.

src: using 64-channel multidetector row computed tomographic angiography ( mdcta ) , we evaluated morphological features of the major systemic vessels in micropigs and compared our results to published human data . the main vasculature of the animals was similar to that of humans , except for the iliac arterial system . however , diameters of the major systemic vessels were significantly different between micropigs and humans .
bt: Using a 64-line multi-detector computed tomographic angiography (mdcta), we evaluated the morphological characteristics of the main systemic vessels of micro-cats and compared our results to published human data . The main vasculation of the animals was similar to that of humans , except for the iliac blood system . However , the diameters of the systemic vessels were significantly different between micro-cats and humans .

src: essential palatal tremor ( ept ) is a rare disorder which shows rhythmic involuntary movement of the muscles of soft palate , especially tensor veli palatini muscle . ept is classified by two subtypes , which is primary and secondary ept . secondary ept includes psychogenic type .
bt: Ept is a rare disorder that shows involuntary rhythmic movement of the muscles of the soft palate, particularly the palatal vein tensor muscle. Ept is classified into two subtypes, primary and secondary.

src: atlantic correction equations were developed in the mhw subsample . using separate multiple regression models for men and women , self - reported body mass index ( bmi ) was corrected by multiplying the self - reported estimate by its corresponding model coefficient and adding the model intercept . paired t - tests were used to determine whether corrected mean bmi values were significantly more accurate ( i.e. , closer to measured data ) than the equivalent means based on self - reported data .
bt: Atlantic correction equations were developed in the mhw subsample . Using separate multiple regression models for men and women , the self-reported body mass index (bmi) was corrected by multiplying the self-reported estimate by its corresponding model coefficient and adding . T-parity tests were used to determine whether the corrected average bmi values were significantly more accurate (i.e. closer to the measured data) than the equivalent means based on the self-reported data .

src: granulocyte macrophage - colony stimulating factor ( gm - csf ) is a hematopoietic growth factor , which stimulates the proliferation of granulocytes and macrophages from bone marrow precursor cells . in autoimmune and inflammatory diseases , th17 cells have been considered as strong inducers of tissue inflammation . however , recent evidence indicates that gm - csf has prominent proinflammatory functions and that this growth factor ( not il-17 ) is critical for the pathogenicity of cd4 + t cells .
bt: The hematopoietic growth factor (gm-csf) is a hematopoietic growth factor that stimulates the proliferation of granulocytes and macrophages from bone marrow precursor cells. In autoimmune and inflammatory diseases, th17 cells have been considered to be powerful inducers of tissue inflammation. However, recent evidence indicates that gm-csf has prominent pro-inflammatory functions and that this growth factor (not il-17) is essential for the pathogenicity of cd4+ t cells.

src: the initial step of atrioventricular ( av ) valve development involves the deposition of extracellular matrix ( ecm ) components of the endocardial cushion and the endocardialmesenchymal transition . while the appropriately regulated expression of the major ecm components , versican and hyaluronan , that form the endocardial cushion is important for heart valve development , the underlying mechanism that regulates ecm gene expression remains unclear . we found that zebrafish crip2 expression is restricted to a subset of cells in the av canal ( avc ) endocardium at 55 hours post - fertilization ( hpf ) .
bt: The initial stage of atrioventricular valve (av) development involves the deposit of extracellular components of the endocardial valve matrix (ecm) and the endocardialmesenchymal transition.While the correctly regulated expression of the major components ecm, versican and hyaluronan, which form the endocardial valve, is important for the development of the heart valve, the underlying mechanism regulating the expression of the ecm gene remains uncertain.

src: leonurus cardiaca , commonly known as motherwort , is a member of the lamiaceae family . it has a number of interesting biological activities , for example , sedative and hypotensive , antioxidant , anti - inflammatory , and antimicrobial activities . the aim of the present study was to investigate the effect of alcoholic extract of aerial part of leonurus cardiaca on nociceptive response using formalin , tail flick , and hot plate tests in mice .
bt: The corpus cardiaca , commonly called motherwort , is a member of the lamiaceae family . It has a number of interesting biological activities , for example, sedative and hypotensive , antioxidant , anti-inflammatory and antimicrobial . The purpose of this study was to study the effect of the alcoholic extract of the aerial part of leonurus cardiaca on nociceptive response using the mouse formula and hot-plate tests of leon .

src: peripheral osteomas of jaw bone are uncommon and usually associated with gardner 's syndrome . histological examination confirmed the clinical impression of a peripheral osteoma . patient was reviewed after one year and was asymptomatic with no recurrence of the lesion .
bt: Peripheral jaw bone osteomas are rare and are usually associated with Gardner syndrome. A histological examination confirmed the clinical impression of a peripheral osteoma. The patient was examined after one year and was asymptomatic without recurrence of the lesion.

src: carcinoid bronchopulmonary tumors represent approximately 25% of all carcinoid tumors and 1%2% of all lung neoplasms . the most common symptoms are : persistent cough , asthma - like wheezing , chest pain , dyspnea , hemoptysis and obstructive pneumonitis . we present a case of a young adult diagnosed with a typical carcinoid tumor .
bt: Bronchopulmonary carcinogenic tumors account for about 25% of all carcinogenic tumors and 1%2% of all pulmonary neoplasms. The most common symptoms are persistent cough, asthma-like bloating, chest pain, dyspnea, hemoptysis and obstructive pneumonitis. We have a case of a young adult diagnosed with a typical carcinogenic tumor.

src: matrix metalloproteinase-9 ( mmp-9 ) , regulated by tissue inhibitor of metalloproteinase-9 ( timp-1 ) and the extracellular matrix metalloproteinase inducer ( emmprin ) , contributes to plaque instability . autologous stem cells from bone marrow ( mbmc ) treatment are suggested to reduce myocardial damage ; however , limited data exists on the influence of mbmc on mmps . we investigated the influence of mbmc on circulating levels of mmp-9 , timp-1 , and emmprin at different time points in patients included in the randomized autologous stem - cell transplantation in acute myocardial infarction ( astami ) trial ( n = 100 ) .
bt: Metalloprotenatase-9 (mmp-9) matrix, regulated by the tissue inhibitor of metalloprotenatase-9 ( timp-1) and the extracellular inducer of metalloprotenatase (emmprin) matrix, contributes to plaque instability. Autologous stem cells from bone marrow treatment (mc) are suggested to reduce myocardial damage; however, there is limited data on the influence of mbmc on mmps.

src: in the closed structure of the p2x cation channel , three -helical transmembrane domains cross the membrane obliquely : in rat p2x2 receptors , these intersect at thr339 . replacing thr339 by lysine in one , two or three subunits progressively increased chloride permeability and reduced unitary conductance . this implies that the closed - open transition involves a symmetrical separation of the three subunits , and that thr339 from each contributes symmetrically to the open channel permeation pathway .
bt: In the closed structure of the p2x cation channel , three transmembrane helicoid domains cross the membrane obliquely: in the p2x2 receptors of rats , these intersect at thr339 . by replacing thr339 with lysine in one , two or three subunits , the permeability of chloride is gradually increased and the unit conductivity reduced . This implies that the closed-open transition involves a symmetrical separation of the three subunits , and that thr339 contributes symmetrically to the open channel permeability pathway .

src: recently , management of ludwig 's angina has evolved from aggressive airway management into a more conservative one . this is based on close airway observation on a specialised airway unit and a serial clinical airway assessment . improved imaging modalities , antibiotic therapy , surgical skills , and clinical experience are the key factors behind this change in practice .
bt: Recently, management of ludwig angina has shifted from aggressive airway management to more conservative management, based on close airway observation on a specialized airway unit and a serial clinical evaluation of airways.

bt: The demographic definition was standardized.Patients were divided into two groups, namely d (anticholinergics stopped at randomization, previously prescribed) and nd (anticholinergics not stopped, not prescribed).Demographic data were balanced between d (n = 5846) and nd (n = 6317), with the exception of higher cumulative smoking (years of 56 packets versus 48 packets - years), lower forced expiration volume per second (fev1) / forced vital capacity (43% versus 48%) and a low fev1 (predictable versus 42.4% predictable) in the d group.

bt: The results of the comparison of treatment plans using the 2d and 3d methods are described . src: objectivediabetic patients have a high prevalence of coronary artery disease ( cad ) , but timely diagnosis of cad remains challenging . we assessed the ability of coronary computed tomography angiography ( ccta ) to detect cad in diabetic patients and to predict subsequent cardiac events.research design and methodswe analyzed 140 diabetic patients without known cad undergoing ccta ; 1,782 patients without diabetes were used as a control group . besides calcium scoring and the degree of the most severe stenosis , the atherosclerotic burden score counting the number of segments having either a nonstenotic plaque or a stenosis was recorded .
bt: We assessed the ability of coronary angiography (CCTA) to detect cad in diabetic patients and predict subsequent heart events. Research design and methods analyzed 140 diabetic patients without known cad in CTA; 1,782 patients without diabetes were used as control groups. In addition to calcium score and degree of stenosis, the atherosclerotic load score counting the number of segments with a non-stenosis plaque or stenosis was recorded.

src: objectivethe mental health of military personnel varies as a result of different cultural , political , and administrative factors . the purpose of this study was to evaluate the psychological morbidity and quality of life of military personnel in taiwan.materials and methodsthis cross - sectional study utilized the world health organization quality of life instrument , brief version , taiwan version , the general health questionnaire-12 , chinese version , and the visual analog scale ( vas ) in several military units.resultsmore than half of the subjects ( 55.3% ) identified themselves as mentally unhealthy on the general health questionnaire-12 , chinese version ; however , a higher percentage of officers perceived themselves as healthy ( 57.4% ) than did noncommissioned officers ( 38.5% ) or enlisted men ( 42.2% ) . officers also had higher total quality of life ( qol ) scores ( 83.98 ) than did enlisted men ( 79.67 ) .
bt: The objective of military personnel's mental health varies due to different cultural, political and administrative factors.The purpose of this study was to assess the psychological morbidity and quality of life of military personnel in Taiwan.Materials and methodsThis cross-sectional study used the World Health Organization's Quality of Life Tool, Short Version, Taiwanese Version, General Health Questionnaire-12 , Chinese Version, and the analog visual scale (vas) in several military units.ResultsMore than half of the subjects (55.3%) identified themselves as unhealthy on the General Health Questionnaire-12 , Chinese Version; however, a higher percentage of officers were perceived as healthy.

bt: In cells transferred with the il-10 system, corm-2 had no effect on the lps-induced expression of tn-c and its downstream cytokines.

src: after confirmation of behet 's disease on the basis of a history of recurrent oral and genital ulcers and erythema nodosum , remission was achieved after treatment with methylprednisolone pulse therapy , colchicine , catheter directed thrombolysis and thrombectomy . however , whilst maintaining anticoagulation therapy , a newly developed pericardial aneurysmal dilatation was noted on follow - up radiologic evaluation . further evaluation revealed right coronary artery stenosis and a left coronary artery pseudo aneurysm ; these additional problems were treated with the nonsurgical insertion of an endovascular graft stent .
bt: Confirmation of Behet's disease based on a history of recurrent oral and genital ulcers and nodosum erythema, remission was obtained after treatment with methylprednisolone pulse therapy, colchicine, catheter-directed thrombolysis, and thrombectomy. However, while maintaining anticoagulant treatment, dilation of a newly developed pericardial aneurysm was observed during a follow-up radiological evaluation.

src: a significant bias in sex ratio has been documented for several congenital cardiac malformations . transposition of the great arteries has been associated with a such a bias but no explanation has been proposed for this bias . we evaluated 95 isolated livebirths with transposition of the great arteries cases referred to the sicilian registry of congenital malformations from 1991 to 1998 .
bt: A significant gender bias has been documented for several congenital heart defects. Transposition of the great arteries has been associated with such a bias but no explanation has been proposed for this bias. We evaluated 95 live births with the transposition of cases of the great arteries referred to the Sicilian Registry of Congenital Deformities from 1991 to 1998.

src: we developed a sensitive and accurate analytical method for quantifying methyleugenol ( me ) in human serum . our method uses a simple solid - phase extraction followed by a highly specific analysis using isotope dilution gas chromatography - high resolution mass spectrometry . our method is very accurate ; its limit of detection is 3.1 pg / g and its average coefficient of variation is 14% over a 200-pg / g range .
bt: We have developed a sensitive and precise analytical method to quantify methyl-genol (me) in human serum. Our method uses simple solid phase extraction followed by very specific analysis using isotope-dilute gas chromatography - high-resolution mass spectrometry. Our method is very precise; its detection limit is 3.1 pg/g and its mean coefficient of variation is 14% over a range of 200 pg/g.

bt: No obstruction of the uventa stents occurred during the average follow-up period of 7.3 months (patent rate 100%), but a urethral obstruction developed again in 4 ureters. There were no cases of hyperplastic reaction, incrustation or migration.

src: backgroundlimbal ring ( also known as circle ) contact lenses are becoming increasingly popular , especially in asian markets because of their eye - enhancing effects . the pigment particles that give the eye - enhancing effects of these lenses can be found on the front or back surface of the contact lens or enclosed within the lens matrix . the purpose of this research was to evaluate the pigment location and surface roughness of seven types of circle contact lenses.methodsscanning electron microscopic ( sem ) analysis was performed using a variable pressure hitachi s3400n instrument to discern the placement of lens pigments .
bt: The pigment particles that give eye-reinforcing effects to these lenses can be found on the front or back surface of the contact lens or enclosed in the lens matrix. The purpose of this research was to assess the pigment location and surface roughness of seven types of circular contact lenses.

src: subsidence and late fusion are commonly observed in anterior subtotal corpectomy and reconstruction for treating thoracolumbar burst fractures . the subsidence rate of this surgical method was reported from 19.6% to 75% in the literatures , which would cause treatment failure . thus , an improvement of anterior surgery technique should be studied to reduce these complications.130 patients of thoracolumbar burst fractures treated by minimal corpectomy , decompression and u cage , between january 2009 and december 2010 were included in this study .
bt: The decline rate of this surgical method was reported in the literature from 19.6% to 75%, which would have caused treatment failure. Thus, an improvement in the technique of previous surgery should be studied to reduce these complications. 130 patients with thoracolumbar decolumbar fractures treated with minimal corpectomy, decompression and thigh cage between January 2009 and December 2010 were included in this study.

src: retroperitoneal liposarcoma is a rare tumor . the dimension and weight of liposarcoma are variable ; those over 20 kg are called giant liposarcoma. herein , we report giant retroperitoneal liposarcoma measuring 45 cm in diameter and 25 kg in weight encasing the entire left kidney and adherent to adjacent structures .
bt: The retroperitoneal liposarcoma is a rare tumor. The size and weight of the liposarcoma are variable; those over 20 kg are called giant liposarcomas. Here, we're reporting a giant retroperitoneal liposarcoma measuring 45 cm in diameter and 25 kg in weight that envelops the entire left kidney and adheres to adjacent structures.

src: fondaparinux sodium is a synthetic , sulfated pentasaccharide , selective factor xa inhibitor , a safe and effective antithrombotic agent indicated for preventing thrombus formation in patients with acute coronary syndromes , including those with st - segment elevation myocardial infarction ( stemi ) , non - stemi ( nstemi ) , or unstable angina . major bleeding is rarely known to exist with the use of fondaparinux and to best of our knowledge there exist no isolated case report presenting with fondaparinux - induced major bleeding prescribed for recently diagnosed nstemi . the case report highlights , a need for clinicians to have a sound understanding of anticoagulant pharmacology , dosing , toxicity , individualized approach , and predicting the risk of bleeding before they are prescribed to advancing age persons .
bt: Sodium pentasaccharide is a synthetic sulfated pentasaccharide, selective factor xa inhibitor, a safe and effective antithrombotic agent indicated for preventing thrombus formation in patients with acute coronary syndromes, including those with ST-elevated myocardial infarction (STEM), non-STEMI or unstable angina. Major bleeding is rarely known with the use of fondaparinux and, to our knowledge, there are no isolated cases of fondaparinux-induced major fondaparinux bleeding prescribed for people recently diagnosed with non-STEMI.

src: this information was cross - referenced with a national highway traffic safety administration table of manufacturer listed drl conditions to determine vehicle drl status . crude crash rates for vehicles were calculated relative to the number of all registered vehicles in minnesota in 2004 , for models 19952002 . ninety - five percent confidence intervals ( ci ) for the rates were constructed assuming a poisson error distribution.resultsduring 19952002 , there were 184,637 vehicles ( 1995 or newer ) with identifiable vins involved in accidents which occurred under the specified test conditions .
bt: This information was crossed with a national road safety administration road safety chart of the manufacturer listing drl conditions to determine the vehicle's drl status. Gross vehicle accident rates were calculated against the number of vehicles registered in Minnesota in 2004, for the 1995-2002 models. 85 percent confidence intervals for rates were constructed by assuming a fish error distribution. results during 1995-2002, there were 184,637 vehicles (from 1995 or more recently) with identifiable wines involved in accidents that occurred under specified test conditions.

src: whole blood cultures were stimulated with phytohemagglutinin ( pha ) and concentrations of tumour necrosis factor ( tnf ) , interferon ( ifn ) , interleukin 2 ( il-2 ) , interleukin 12 ( il-12 ) , interleukin 4 ( il-4 ) , and interleukin 10 ( il-10 ) were determined by elisas . a significant increase in cytokine release was detected in hr - hpv - positive women without dysplasia . in women with cervical cancer , release of ifn and il-12 was of the same magnitude as in hr - hpv - positive women without clinical manifestations .
bt: Blood cultures were stimulated by whole phytohemagglutinin (pha) and concentrations of tumor necrosis factor (tnf), interferon (ifn), interleukin 2 (il-2), interleukin 12 (il-12), interleukin 4 (il-4) and interleukin 10 (il-10) were determined by elisas. A significant increase in cytokine release was detected in h-HPv-positive women without dysplasia. In women with cervical cancer, the release of IFN and il-12 was as widespread as in h-HPv-positive women without clinical manifestations.

src: we have previously isolated -cop , the -cop interactor in copi of aspergillus nidulans , by yeast two - hybrid screening . to understand the function of -cop , the anea+ gene for -cop / anea was deleted by homologous recombination using a gene - specific disruption cassette . deletion of the -cop gene showed no detectable changes in vegetative growth or asexual development , but resulted in decrease in the production of the fruiting body , cleistothecium , under conditions favorable for sexual development .
bt: We previously isolated -cop , the cop-interacting agent into copies of aspergillus nidulans , by hybrid yeasting . To understand the function of -cop , the anea+ gene was removed by homologous recombination using a gene-specific disruption cassette . The suppression of the -cop gene showed no detectable changes in vegetative growth or asexual development , but resulted in a decrease in the production of the fruiting body , cleistothecium , under conditions conducive to sexual development .

src: the number of death due to cancer has been increasing in korea . chemotherapy is known to cause side effects because it damages not only cancerous cells but healthy cells . recently , attention has focused on food - derived chemopreventive and anti - tumor agents or formulations with fewer side effects .
bt: The number of cancer deaths is increasing in Korea. Chemotherapy is known to cause side effects because it damages not only cancer cells but also healthy cells. Recently, attention has been focused on chemopreventive and anti-tumor products from food or formulations with fewer side effects.

src: exosomes are small extracellular vesicles , which stem from endosomes fusing with the plasma membrane , and can be recaptured by receiving cells . they contain lipids , proteins , and rnas able to modify the physiology of receiving cells . functioning of the brain relies on intercellular communication between neural cells .
bt: Exosomes are small extracellular vesicles, which originate from endosomes fusing with the plasma membrane, and can be recaptured by receptive cells. They contain lipids, proteins, and RNAs that can alter the physiology of receptive cells. Intercellular communication between neurons is necessary for the functioning of the brain.

bt: The composite formed emits an orange red fluorescence around 600 nm and has been studied at the highest intensity at an mn2 + doping concentration of 15 to.% and relatively more stable at low acid and alkaline pH levels . Structural characteristics and optical properties have been analysed using the infrared fourier transformer , x-ray diffraction , dynamic light diffusion , visible ultraviolet and fluorescence spectroscopy .

src: food chain information ( fci ) is an innovation of the new european regulation . its purpose is to enhance the concept of food security . fci includes specifications such as : health status , information on treatments and diseases , analytical reports on control plans , zoonoses or environmental contaminants , production performance , etc .
bt: Food chain information (FCI) is an innovation of the new European Regulation , which aims to improve the concept of food safety .

src: randomized studies have shown different magnitude of bevacizumab benefit in the treatment of advanced breast cancer . regulatory agencies have modified bevacizumab treatment indications across different regions . in this study , we perform a meta - analysis of phase iii studies aiming to interrogate the magnitude of bevacizumab benefit for the treatment of first - line her2-negative metastatic breast cancer ( mbc ) .
bt: Randomized studies have shown a different magnitude of bevacizumab's benefit in the treatment of advanced breast cancer. Regulatory agencies have modified bevacizumab treatment indications in different regions. In this study, we conduct a meta-analysis of phase iii studies to investigate the extent of bevacizumab's benefit in the treatment of first-line metastatic her2-negative breast cancer (mbc).

src: recent work demonstrates that retention of a single functional retinoblastoma susceptibility ( rb1 ) allele is insufficient to maintain genome stability . haploinsufficiency of rb1 accelerates cancer pathogenesis in concert with inactivation of tumor protein p53 . collectively , multiple lines of evidence suggest revision of the 2-hit model to include conditional haploinsufficiency of rb1 .
bt: Recent work shows that the retention of a single functional retinoblastoma sensitivity allele (rb1) is insufficient to maintain the stability of the genome. rb1 haplinsufficiency accelerates the pathogenesis of cancer along with inactivation of tumor protein p53. Collectively, several lines of evidence suggest a revision of the 2-hit model to include conditional haplinsufficiency of rb1.

src: this research takes place in the s(ma)2d project which proposes software architecture to monitor elderly people in their own homes . we want to build patterns dynamically from data about activity , movements , and physiological information of the monitored people . to achieve that , we propose a multiagent method of classification : every agent has a simple know - how of classification .
bt: This research is being carried out as part of the project s(ma)2d which proposes a software architecture to monitor the elderly in their own homes.We want to build models dynamically from data on the activity, movements and physiological information of the people being monitored.To achieve this, we propose a multi-agent classification method: each agent has a simple know-how.

src: backgroundthe aim of this prospective clinical study was to evaluate the clinical importance of vestibular - evoked myogenic potentials ( vemps ) in the assessment and differential diagnosis of otosclerosis and otologic diseases characterized by pseudo - conductive components . we also investigated the clinical appearance of balance disorders in patients with otosclerosis by correlating vemp results with the findings of caloric testing and pure tone audiometry(pta).material / methodsair - conducted(ac ) 4-pta , bone - conducted(bc ) 4-pta , air - bone gap(abg ) , ac , bc tone burst evoked vemp , and calorics were measured preoperatively in 126 otosclerotic ears.resultsthe response rate of the ac - vemps and bc - vemps was 29.36% and 44.03% , respectively . statistical differences were found between the means of abg , ac 4-pta , and bc 4-pta in the otosclerotic ears in relation to ac - vemp elicitability .
bt: We also studied the clinical occurrence of balance disorders in patients with otosclerosis by correlating vemp results with the results of calorie tests and pure tone audiometry (p.t.).Material/methodesair - performed ac ) 4-pta , bone - (bc) - (bc) - (p.t.e.), air - bone - (bg) abg), ac , bc-blast tone v , and calories were measured preoperatively in 126 ears.

src: chronic hepatitis c infection poses a major global health predicament and appears to be potent threat to mankind . the treatment in wide use is interferon / ribavirin combination therapy which is generally effective in about 60 - 70 per cent of patients carrying genotype 3 and causes significant morbidity . the response to therapy is largely guided by limited number of factors such as genotype of virus , rapid virological response , ethnicity , pre - therapy viral load , etc .
bt: Chronic hepatitis C infection is a major global health problem and appears to be a powerful threat to humanity. The widely used treatment is interferon/ribavirin combined which is generally effective in about 60-70% of patients with genotype 3. Treatment response is largely guided by a limited number of factors such as virus genotype, rapid virological response, ethnic origin, pre-therapeutic viral load, etc.

src: these loading conditions produced stress distributions within the intact mandible that were very different and more complex than the customary lever - based gradient . the analyses also demonstrated the entirely different mechanical environments within intact and plated mandibles . because the loading and geometry of the lever - idealized mandible is incomplete , the associated widely accepted bone stress distribution ( tension on top and compression on the bottom ) should not be assumed .
bt: Loading conditions produced stress distributions in the intact mandible that were very different and more complex than the usual gradient based on the lever. Analyses also demonstrated completely different mechanical environments in these intact and coated mandibles. Because the load and geometry of the idealized lever- mandible is incomplete, the widely accepted associated bone stress distribution (tension up and compression down) should not be assumed.

bt: The increase in wear of the erotic teeth was calculated. in the case of dentin, this final measurement was made with and without the demineralized organic matrix (dom). enamel and dentin data were analysed using the anova/tukey s and kruskal-wallis/dunn tests, respectively (p<0.05).

src: diabetes mellitus is a metabolic disorder and its subsequent complications such as retinopathy , nephropathy , ulcers , disability , and amputation increase the burden of the disease . patient knowledge - improving programs are employed to prevent disease progression and to improve the quality of life of the patients . in this way , we need to characterize the groups of patients in urgent need for more and rich - in - content programs .
bt: Diabetes mellitus is a metabolic disorder and its subsequent complications such as retinopathy, nephropathy, ulcers, disability and amputation increase the burden of the disease. Patient awareness-raising programs are used to prevent disease progression and improve the quality of life of patients. In this way, we need to characterize the groups of patients who urgently need more content-rich programs.

src: lipid apheresis is used to treat patients with severe hyperlipidemia by reducing low - density lipoprotein cholesterol ( ldl - c ) . this study examines the effect of apheresis on the lipid panel and cardiac event rates before and after apheresis . an electronic health record screen of ambulatory patients identified 11 active patients undergoing lipid apheresis with 10/11 carrying a diagnosis of fh .
bt: Lipid apheresis is used to treat patients with severe hyperlipidemia by reducing low-density lipoprotein cholesterol (LDL-C). This study examines the effect of apheresis on the lipid panel and rates of heart events before and after apheresis. An electronic screening of medical records of clinical patients identified 11 active patients with lipid apheresis.

bt: Therefore, we tested the interaction of human oats2 with various substances using tritium-labelled cgmp. human oats2 showed no interaction with diabetes-related metabolites, diabetic medicines and acid inhibitors. However, the absorption of cgmp was inhibited by furosemide .

src: here , the trypanocidal potential of gallates was assayed in epimastigotes forms of t. cruzi and also , the interference of these substances on the mitochondrial membrane potential of the parasites was assessed , allowing the study of the mechanism of action of the gallates in the t. cruzi organisms . regarding the preliminary structure - activity relationships , the side chain length of gallates plays crucial role for activity . nonyl , decyl , undecyl , and dodecyl gallates showed potent antitrypanosomal effect ( ic50 from 1.46 to 2.90 m ) in contrast with benznidazole ( ic50 = 34.0 m ) .
bt: In addition, the interference of these substances with the mitochondrial membrane potential of parasites was evaluated, which led to the study of the mechanism of action of gallates in t. cruzi organisms. As regards the preliminary structure-activity relationships, the length of the gallate side chain plays a crucial role for activity. Nonyl, decyl, undecyl and dodecyllates showed a powerful antitrypanosomal effect (ic50 of 1.46 to 2.90 m) compared to benznidazole (ic50 = 34.0 m).

src: early diagnosis and management of depression is important for better therapeutic outcome . strategies for distinguishing between unipolar and bipolar depression are yet to be defined , resulting improper management . this study aims at comparing the socio - demographic and other variables between patients with unipolar and bipolar depression , along with assessment of severity of depression.this cross sectional study was conducted in a tertiary care psychiatry hospital in north - east india .
bt: Early diagnosis and management of depression are important for better therapeutic outcome. Strategies for distinguishing between unipolar and bipolar depression have not yet been defined, leading to poor management. This study aims to compare socio-demographic and other variables between patients with unipolar and bipolar depression, as well as an assessment of the severity of depression. This cross-sectional study was conducted in a tertiary care psychiatric hospital in north-east India.

src: prune2 plays an important role in regulating tumor cell differentiation , proliferation , and invasiveness in neuroblastoma . our previous study revealed that prune2/obscn two - gene relative expression classifer accurately differentiated leiomyosarcoma from gastrointestinal stromal tumor . however , the association between prune2 expression and prognosis in leiomyosarcoma is poorly understood .
bt: Prune2 plays an important role in regulating the differentiation , proliferation and invasiveness of tumor cells in the neuroblastoma . Our previous study found that the classifier of the relative expression of the two prune2/obscn genes accurately differentiated the gastrointestinal stromal tumor leomyosarcoma . However , the association between prune2 expression and prognosis is poorly understood .

src: the accumulation of excess body weight may have important health and disease consequences for persons with multiple sclerosis ( ms ) . this study examined the effect of weight status on mobility using a comprehensive set of mobility outcomes including ambulatory performance ( timed 25-foot walk , t25fw ; 6-minute walk , 6mw ; oxygen cost of walking , cw ; spatiotemporal parameters of gait ; self - reported walking impairment , multiple sclerosis walking scale-12 ( msws-12 ) ; and free - living activity , accelerometry ) in 168 ambulatory persons with ms . mean ( sd ) bmi was 27.7 ( 5.1 ) kg / m2 .
bt: This study examined the effect of weight status on mobility using a comprehensive set of mobility results, including outpatient performance (walk of 25 feet, t25fw; walking of 6 minutes, 6mw; walking oxygen cost, cw; walking spatiotemporal parameters; self-reported walking disability, MS-12 (msws-12); and free-life activity, accelerometry) in 168 outpatient people with MS.

bt: To determine the roughness of glass surfaces undergoing different treatments and to correlate it with the rate of propagation of two adhesives systems. Glass slides were used as a substrate to assess the rate of propagation of double bonded adhesives systems and first and second. Six different surface treatments were compared: 1) untreated; 2) silinization (sl ); 3) sandstation ( sb  4; 2) sb + sl  5  10% treatment by hydrofluoric acid (hf ); 6) hf + . before and after the treatments , surface roughness was measured by a profile (ra , m).

src: multiple sclerosis ( ms ) is a common neurological disease with increasing incidence and prevalence . onset of disease is most frequently in young adulthood when productivity is usually highest ; it is of chronic nature and , in the majority of patients , it will result in accumulation of disability . due to loss of productivity in patients and caregivers as well as high expenses for medical treatment , ms is considered a disease with high economic burden for patients and society .
bt: Multiple sclerosis (MS) is a common neurological disease with an increasing incidence and prevalence. The onset of the disease is most common in young adults, when productivity is usually highest; it is chronic and, in the majority of patients, will lead to an accumulation of disability. Due to the loss of productivity in patients and caregivers as well as high medical care costs, MS is considered a disease with a high economic burden on society.

src: drug - induced gingival overgrowth ( digo ) can be a serious concern for both patients and clinicians . digo is a well - documented side - effect of some pharmacologic agents , including , but not limited to , calcium channel blockers , phenytoin , and cyclosporine . plasma cell granulomas ( pseudotumors ) are exceedingly rare , non - neoplastic , reactive tumor - like proliferation , primarily composed of plasma cells that manifest primarily in the lungs , but may occur in various anatomic locations .
bt: - drug-induced overgrowth of the gingiva glands (digos) can be a serious concern for patients and clinicians . Digos is a well-documented side effect of certain pharmacological agents including but not limited to calcium channel blockers , phenytoin and cyclosporin . Plasma cell granulomas (pseudotumors) are extremely rare , non-neoplastic , reactive tumors - such as proliferation , mainly composed of plasma cells that occur mainly in the lungs but can occur in various anatomical locations .

bt: A square statistical analysis of chi was used to test the importance of association between doctors and nurses with various result variables (reporting motivators, perceived barriers, preferred person to report and patient outcome that influence reporting behaviours). The p value of < 0.05 was considered significant.
